text: Keini chongroon khachu, Christa jarra Pathian in miring rakip asap min-enasik iboolhi eii.5:19. Christa jarra Pathian in miring rakip asap min-enasik ibool emakli Pathian in Christa diang omma miring rakip hi asap min-enasik ibool Inmani manu kha Pathian in teelpi makjei, halli angtho thoa ama'n inmani kha sap ah iboolme ti chongkha ama'n keinidiang anapejei.
